mapper.select: SELECT A.MEM_NO , A.MEM_NAME , A.ENROLL_DATE , B.REQ_NO , B.REQ_DATE , C.PAY_PRICE FROM MEMBER A JOIN REQUEST_INFO B ON (B.MEM_NO_CLEANER = A.MEM_NO) JOIN PAY_HISTORY C ON (C.REQ_NO = B.REQ_NO) WHERE B.REQ_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('210801000000', 'RRMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE('210831235959', 'RRMMDDHH24MISS') AND A.MEMBER_ROLE = '해결사';
